description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=3/3, Sex=3/3, Mature Content=1/3. Alice returns in this action packed sequel to continue her fight for survival! Battle through all new environments, fight new types of zombie and take on new quests to advance the plot. Survival horror has never been so real!
description.short: Alice returns in this action packed sequel to continue her fight for survival! Battle through all new environments, fight new types of zombie and take on new quests to advance the plot. Survival horror has never been so real!
